Translations.Text: He frowned and turned away
when the blind man approached him
For all you know, he might be seeking to purify himself
or to be reminded and be helped by being reminded
As for him who was indifferent
you [Prophet] gave him your attention
Though it is not up to you whether or not he is purified
As for him who came to you eagerly
with God's fear in his heart
from him you are distracted
Indeed this is a reminder
So, whoever wills may remember it
it is [written] on honored sheets
Exalted and purified
by the hands of scribes
honorable and virtuous
How regretful it is for people to have so much self-destructive ingratitude
From what did He create him
From a fertilized ovum He created him and proportioned him
Then He eased the way for him
Then He causes him to die and to be buried
Then when He wills, He will resurrect him
No! He did not fulfill what He has commanded him
A human being has only to consider the food he eats
We poured down water in abundance
and caused the soil to break open
and grew grains in it
and grapes and legumes
olive and dates
and luxurious gardens
and fruits and vegetable
for you and your livestock to enjoy
But when the Deafening Blast comes
on the Day when a human being will flee from his brother
his mother, his father
his wife and his children
every one of them, on that Day, will have enough to preoccupy him
Faces on that Day will be beaming
laughing and rejoicing
And [other] faces, on that Day, will be covered with dust
overwhelmed by sorrow
These are the unbelievers, the wicked ones
When the sun folds
and the stars are dispersed
when the mountains are shifting
and when full-term she-camels are neglected
When the wild beasts are gathered
when the seas are set aflame
when the souls are paired
when the female baby who was buried alive is asked
for what sin she was killed
When the records are made public
when the sky is stripped away
when Hell is set ablaze
when Paradise is brought into view
every soul will then know what it has brought with it
I swear by the planets
the runners and sweepers
and by the night as it recedes
and the dawn when it breathes
this revelation is indeed the word of a honorable Messenger
endowed with strength, secure with the Lord of the Throne
obeyed and trustworthy
This fellow of yours is not mad
he has already seen him [Gabriel] in the clear horizon
He does not withhold what is revealed to him from beyond
And it (the Qur'an) is not the word of a devil, expelled from Heaven
So where, then, will you go
It is only a reminder to all humankind
for whoever wills among you to go straight
But you cannot will, unless God, the Lord of the worlds, so wills
